inner_circle.name: Emma Zhao
inner_circle.context: Met at a design conference. Also a designer, works at a sustainability startup in NYC.

interaction_dynamics.support_style: Emma is grounding when Marcus spirals. He processes out loud with her.
interaction_dynamics.tension_points: Marcus can withdraw when stressed; Emma prefers direct communication about struggles.

inner_circle.name: Mom
inner_circle.context: Supportive and caring. Messages regularly, especially before important events like thesis critiques.

interaction_dynamics.support_style: Expresses care through encouragement and concern. Sends supportive messages before big days.
interaction_dynamics.tension_points: Can be anxious about Marcus's wellbeing. Marcus sometimes delays calls when stressed to avoid worry.

lifeos_notes.special_rules: Remind Marcus if he hasn't called in 10+ days. Surface messages on important days.

inner_circle.name: Sarah Chen
inner_circle.context: Design cohort peer at SVA. Working on thesis about AI and creative agency in music production. They support each other through critiques.

interaction_dynamics.support_style: Mutual academic support. They review each other's work and debrief after critiques.
interaction_dynamics.tension_points: Both stressed during crunch times but generally low-conflict.

lifeos_notes.special_rules: Always surface during thesis work and critique days

close_network.name: Prof. Martinez
close_network.context: Primary thesis advisor at SVA. Specializes in human-computer interaction and design theory. Supportive but demanding. Values theoretical rigor and clear methodology.

advising_style.feedback_pattern: Direct and constructive. Pushes for sharper arguments.
advising_style.relationship_quality: Supportive, willing to have conversations beyond just academic (career, life advice)

lifeos_notes.special_rules: Always surface messages before scheduled meetings

close_network.name: Prof. Chen
close_network.context: Interaction design faculty at SVA. Part of Marcus's thesis committee.

close_network.name: Prof. Williams
close_network.context: Theory specialist at SVA. Part of Marcus's thesis committee.

close_network.name: Design Cohort Group
close_network.context: Group chat with fellow SVA design students. Coordination for critiques, social events, mutual support.

lifeos_notes.special_rules: Batch with other casual communications. Surface coordination messages on critique days.

relationship_patterns.initiation_tendency: Marcus is more responsive than initiating. LifeOS prompts relationship maintenance.
relationship_patterns.conflict_style: Avoidant initially, then direct once he's processed. Needs space before difficult conversations.
relationship_patterns.support_seeking: Tends to withdraw rather than seek support. LifeOS monitors for isolation patterns.
relationship_patterns.social_energy: Introverted. Needs recovery time after social events. Prefers depth over breadth.
